website_summaries.verdict: Sony's Cyber-shot DSC-HX50V is an excellent compact megazoom suitable for snapshooters and enthusiasts, though the latter might be turned off by some aspects of the camera.
pros: Sony's Cyber-shot DSC-HX50V is the smallest, lightest camera with a 30x zoom
It has a large assortment of shooting options, direct control over exposure compensation, and excellent photo and video quality for its class
A Multi Interface Shoe lets you attach a flash, mic, or electronic viewfinder
cons: Despite the additional manual controls and Multi Interface Shoe, the HX50 lacks a couple of things enthusiasts value: a large sensor and raw capture
The flash, mic, and viewfinder accessories are expensive
A slow lens limits its usefulness indoors

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: Although the Sony DSC-HX50V digital camera has been replaced by later models, I had one for many years and have gotten some great shots. I recently dropped my previous one--boo hoo--but for now decided to replace it with another (used) one of the same model Love it--small enough to fit in pocket, clear images, wonderful 30x zoom, good image stabilization, does well in low light. It generally does very well on "intelligent auto" but has many other features once you take the time to learn them. May upgrade one of these days, but for now am happy with this one. Only downside--no view finder, so it is hard to see the screen on bright days.
customer_reviews.author: B. L.

customer_reviews.title: Great super zoom point and shoot.
customer_reviews.text: Good battery life. Fast GPS reception. Ok wifi skills and android app. Great zoom! Good price. Focusing on macro Items can sometimes be a little challenging. If you have patience and play with it it gets great shots though. Coming from a camera that had a touch screen and made focusing super easy, that is one small area I could see to improve. I love that I rarely ever have to adjust lighting or color like I had to do in the past with majority of my point and shoot cameras.
customer_reviews.author: John Hoagland

customer_reviews.title: Think twice
customer_reviews.text: I purchased his camera October 2013 for simple use; family events, holiday, etc. I'm not a professional photographer, it's used maybe once a month. The camera takes beautiful pictures. However, there is now a major problem with the lens focusing. I have contacted Sony, but unfortunately its out of warranty and has to go out for repair, with a minimum cost of $100. I had a Canon for a decade prior to purchasing this Sony product and wore the Canon out. This was a very expensive disappointing product that I regret purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: kschgo

customer_reviews.title: Love the zoom on this thing...
customer_reviews.text: The zoom on this camera is just amazing! Went on a safari and got pictures I never thought I would be able to capture. Easy to use, just left it on 'auto' the whole time. There are guys all around me with huge heavy lenses and this thing trumps them for portability and convenience. The case is form fitting and very handsome. Would buy this again in a heartbeat. In fact, we won 2! The only con is the flash. You have to manually pop it up to use it and it's pretty weak. It only pops up 5 mm, why is this even necessary? Wish they would correct this small con
customer_reviews.author: Happy Dog

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Camera!
customer_reviews.text: Got a refurbished model and can't tell it from new. My thinking is that the company will take extra care to check and ensure refurbished models are in perfect working order. Took it to Japan for 4 weeks and took about 8 thousand photo and dozens of videos. I'm very happy with the camera. Especially the fact that the flash doesn't jump up unless you release it. I had the previous model and that was a pain! Photo quality is great, camera is fast. Small enough to fit in my pocket. Only thing is the zoom was making noises occasionally. Hope it's not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Wekims

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. Been using for 6 months to take concert pix and video primarily. The video is amazing, the zoom is exactly what we needed for shows we aren't up close. My favorite feature about the camera is the low light sensor. In indoor concerts, it really helps bring the light into the pic and has made a huge difference in the quality of the pix, as well as video. I couldn't be more pleased, especially at the price point. Worth every penny so far.
customer_reviews.author: Danelle L Marker

customer_reviews.title: This camera is great - amazing to fit a 30x optical zoom is ...
customer_reviews.text: I have an RX100, which is a fabulous camera, but wanted another small camera with a big zoom. This camera is great - amazing to fit a 30x optical zoom is such small camera. I informally compared shots between the RX100 and HX50 and didn't see a great deal of difference, except in low light situations where the RX100 was clearly better. On the high zoom, it's a bit tricky to find the subject and get the camera to focus correctly. It's helpful to back off a bit on the zoom, get the image in sight and focused and then zoom in again.
customer_reviews.author: T. TIlson

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Until
customer_reviews.text: something inside your backpack, shoulder bag or pocket presses on the integral lens cap, disturbing its alignment, making the camera inoperable. There are so many simple solutions that would keep this innovative camera working. Note: This accordion style lens cover design is nearly universal. It's not unique to Sony. Pity.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Kingman

customer_reviews.title: Takes great pictures
customer_reviews.text: Working well! We bought this one because we got salt water at our beach vacation in the predecessor to this camera. We like the photos in low light! Wow!! They come out great! One thing we don't like is the flash - the previous version of this camera's flash pops up differently (not on a stem). I'm waiting to hit the flash and have it come flying off. They should have stayed with the other flash. We liked it better and didn't stick up as much but don't let that deter you from purchasing this camera. It takes AWESOME photos and we like the zoom too!
customer_reviews.author: Adopt Mom

customer_reviews.title: Lots of features!
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoying this little camera. Picked it up with a giftcard I got at xmas to replace an OLD canon point and shoot. I am very impressed with the "auto-HDR" (not sure what sony calls it) feature where it will rapidly take two pictures and then merge them with the best exposures of both. Makes low light pictures excellent! The Zoom on this is amazing too. Yes it gets shaky at maximum zoom, but it has image stabilization and it does a great job. Looking forward to using this at my son's soccer games in the spring!
customer_reviews.author: D. Whitley

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my Alaskan cruise tour. I love Sony, picture quality is great on all Sony cameras, even the older models. This camera worked perfectly for me to capture wildlife even when it was moving or was very far. Its zoom is great! I'm not a professional photographer, so I wanted something small, easy to use with a good zoom without changing the lens, but still have good quality, and I found it in this camera. It has many great features, and there is one I especially love, which is being able to take pictures while I'm recording.
customer_reviews.author: Gaboca97

customer_reviews.title: Flash is frail
customer_reviews.text: It's a good compact super-zoom, but lacks durability. I purchased this camera 1 year and 20 days ago, so it is now twenty days out of warranty and just burned out its third flash.Discount the time it was at Sony being repaired (twice) and that's three flashes failed in less than one year of use. Granted, I use my camera quite a lot and take tens of thousands of photos a year, but the flash is obviously not up to the standards of the rest of the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck E

customer_reviews.title: love this camera
customer_reviews.text: so small and the zoom works ok indoors too! I still have to use it some more but the reduced Christmas sticker price made this affordable. I wanted to have a new camera for my daughter's wedding in October. My old NIkon L120 was great for outdoor shots, but I had trouble taking good indoor photos with the zoom. This camera is lighter with more zoom and it seems to be able to take some indoor zoom shots with less blurring. I am hoping to get better at taking these shots by tweaking settings and my camera holding technique.
customer_reviews.author: G. Aiello

customer_reviews.title: Best point and shoot camera so far!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is absolutely amazing! We just got back from a two week vacation. I spent a week at the Disney parks and my last week was spent on the beach and in the keys. I had previously owned the Sony dsc-hx30v which I used on two vacations to Hawaii and the picture quality is spectacular. The HX50v is even better! Even taking pictures of fast subjects such as surfers come clear! I was so happy with this particular camera I purchased a second for my father...
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if I did right "upgrading"
customer_reviews.text: I do prefer the Hx20V, it is the same thing the only differences are the wifi and 10X extra zoom. If you have the 20V you keep it, don't make the same mistake "upgrading". Pic quality is a little worst that the 20V. (my personal opinion here). My camera had a blank screen/focus problem but Sony Technicians were kind and fixed my camera under warranty, didn't had to call a lot, just a straight forward good customer service. I Had a awesome experience with Sony. I will be buying more Sony products, thanks Sony! Vince
customer_reviews.author: Vicente W.

customer_reviews.title: This camera takes great photos, and the zoom is truly amazing
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes great photos, and the zoom is truly amazing. Low light photos turn out very well. I do think the menus are terribly confusing though, and therefore it is really difficult to set any manual settings. Luckily just leaving it on the auto mode seems to work well in most cases. I also think the time between pictures is quite long, and the camera is a bit bulky for a point and shoot (doesn't quite fit into my pocket). Overall I am very happy with my purchase, and I would recommend it to anyone looking for a camera with a large zoom.
customer_reviews.author: jchip

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Picture, but a Good Camera
customer_reviews.text: Met condition description. Didn't come with shown accessories, but did come with the Sony leather case and 32gb Sony SD card, which is nice. The camera itself is pretty good, for being relatively small it has great zoom and takes good quality pictures. It doesn't do very well with night/darker light conditions and is generally a little slower than I'd like in-between shots. I initially thought the wifi was an unnecessary and stupid option, but considering you can connect to your camera with your phone and zoom/take pictures from it, that could be handy. From my research, you can't do much better for the class, even though this is a 2013 model.
customer_reviews.author: Titan

customer_reviews.title: Great photos with this camera!
customer_reviews.text: We love the quality of photos and video we get with this camera AND the zoom is just fantastic! With the Sony Play Memories software that is free from the Sony website you can edit photos and videos on your computer. What we like best about this software is we can take videos of our 18 month old granddaughter and then select any frame we want and save it as a picture. It's a great way to capture that perfect smile or move that she makes! Also, the WiFi works very well to quickly get a photo from the camera to your cellphone so you can send it to family and friends either by text or email.
customer_reviews.author: Roger J. Ballenger

customer_reviews.title: Leave your SLR "kit-bag" behind and buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera for its weight and adaptability - it sometimes cannot find its focus and often you cannot see the screen with the sunlight, but you can hold it in your hand and for quick high resolution shots it is perfect. I have moved to it from my SLR "kit bag" and shot 5,000 images on the last trip. Now I have them up on my Mac at home they are clear and well focused. If you like to take a variety of images this is a great little camera.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Dexter-Smith

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Camera
customer_reviews.text: Big things come in small packages can be applied here. As an novice photographer I have had many different cameras including 35mm Nikon 35mm Cannon also a few digital models. This camera surpasses them all, its light weight and compact. The size fits in your pants pocket and the zoom is incredible. Lots of cool features inc Gps that I didn't know about. Picture clarity at 20 MP is awesome. Well worth the money. I would recommend you purchase and enjoy
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: Our camera died last year and we never replaced it. We thought our cell phones would be good enough. Nope! Needed a camera to take decent pictures of my kids now that they're playing high school sports. Took the camera to practice and it takes great action pictures and has a great zoom for what I need!
customer_reviews.author: Picky

customer_reviews.title: Professional resulting images by a camera you can carry I'm your pocket.
customer_reviews.text: I have had the small Nikon the large SLR with interchange lens then a 7.5 meg pixel Sony. This newer model blows them all out of the water for ease of use, total environmental flexibility with easy-to-use settings. Absolutely mind blowing images. Now, I carry my iPhone and Sony camera. Get one and you won't look back. I bought mine for a trip to Santa Fe but it also handles the extremely bright light of my home at the beach. Great camera.
customer_reviews.author: T. Daugherty

customer_reviews.title: The pictures is great for compact camera
customer_reviews.text: The pictures is great for compact camera. but camera's flash was broken after 1 year. I replaced it then another next year the flash was broken again. I'm not sure only I got a bad one or not. also when I take indoor video with low light it's very dark.
customer_reviews.author: Jc.

customer_reviews.title: Extraordinary light and powerful camera
customer_reviews.text: I you go on a trip, leave the rest of your equipment at home, this is all you need, the zoom is awesome, thje image quality for pictures and movies is excellent, light sensitivity is good, very stable under shaking, wide angle view is very good. The LCD is almost useless to see what you are shooting in bright light, but everything else make this light camera an excellent choice to take on a trip
customer_reviews.author: Dr Cisneros

customer_reviews.title: Great photos! Videos not easy to extract.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best point and shoot camera I have owned. The images are crisp, whether the photo is taken indoors or outdoors. The case is really nice for transporting and carrying the camera. The one thing I don't like at all is that I had to download software to extract videos taken with the camera. They are stored on the camera itself, not the SD card, so I am limited with how much video I can take with it. That was a disappointment. I also am not crazy about the noise it makes when I turn it on. I would prefer it to be silent.
customer_reviews.author: DP / SP

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend it
customer_reviews.text: the camera externally is very cute but unfortunately takes terrible photos is a lie that captures images in motion, the video in dark places is bad
customer_reviews.author: Benja

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: With the zoom you can see a fly's BVDs across the room. I like zoom and I only buy Sony software. Other cameras I've owned had good optics but lousy software. I don't want to take night classes to learn how to use a camera and Sony bas both good optics and software. You can get complicated if you want to. I prefer the built-in settings.
customer_reviews.author: BLT

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera! I have tried several over the years & keep coming back to this one. Great zoom, great photos that are easily enlarged (as long as you have your settings for that). Too bad this is not made anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Hermelinda Hoelscher

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: This a great camera to buy. Picture quality is very good and I like the extra features such as picture effects. Camera feels good in hands and the body is quality made of aluminum (maybe). Zoom is perfect. Flash could be improved with add-on. My only gripe is that you can't use the flash while recording.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Sony DDSC-HX50V Review
customer_reviews.text: This camera is awesome, period. It was everything I expected and more. Takes phenomenal photos and the zoom is excellent. It's not a true pocket camera unless you have big pockets, but it will do. The video function is good and offers slow motion playback as well. I got it from Amazon warehouse and the total price was $242.00 with shipping. This was a steal considering the retail price of nearly $350.00. I use my camera weekly so I'm definitely getting my money's worth.
customer_reviews.author: saegc

customer_reviews.title: Does a wonderful job
customer_reviews.text: Excellent all around point-and-shoot camera. The video quality is very high, and works in lower light as well, but the build-in microphone is mediocre, and doesn't work well in concert halls. With the addition of an external mic, this can replace older cameras and camcorders.
customer_reviews.author: scopes

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera for my wife for Christmas - she loves it! Pictures look wonderful, and we both love that the flash can be activated/deactivated simply by popping it up and down. LCD screen is bright and clear. Videos look great, too. As mentioned in other reviews, you can just barely hear the zoom motor in the audio of video that you shoot if you do a lot of zooming in and out while filming, but since we're not shooting a low-budget indie film with this camera it doesn't matter much to us. Definite good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Thompson

customer_reviews.title: A good camera.
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job. I have taken about 4000 photos with it. I do use all the different options that it offers. The camera can be shot using the iPhone app and I have used it with a tripod for group photo with me in the group. This is my 6 or 7th Sony camera. I just wish it was water resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Rbendele

customer_reviews.title: Tech savvy son in law was totally enamored by this camera
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my daughter and son in law. They requested a camera that was not bulky and easy to carry. On Christmas when they opened my tech savvy son in law was totally enamored by this camera. He told me he was amazed by all the features and capabilities of the camera. They have thanked me more than once for giving it to them.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Sony Powershot
customer_reviews.text: I've had this camera for a little over a month. I almost sent it back because it started going crazy on me the pictures kept on changeing for no apparent reason. I figured it was the heat at the beach it had stoped latter on in the day. I only have one beaf with the camera and that is that in video mode there is no pause. Out side of that it has taken great pictures the video quality is also great. I still have alot to learn about the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Felix Ocasio

customer_reviews.title: This is a great Little camera.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Little camera. It is the top-of-the-line for point and shoot cameras. I've had it for over year and Love it. Extremely versatile and of course, many more features than I will ever take advantage of.
customer_reviews.author: Shadow

customer_reviews.title: Good photos and don't need to be a professional
customer_reviews.text: Really nice product. It can be adjusted automatically to any kind of light and focus good. It is a little heavy to be a compact caera, but I guess is because the lenses (30X optical). I don't use to much the wifi feature, it is not too easy to use, but when I tried to transfer photos to my smartphone, I did it well.
customer_reviews.author: xdiazrod

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Compact!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the image is on par with any camera of the 20 MP range. The zoom of 30X (optical) is amazing. The internal stabilizing allows hand held shots with a lot of tele going on!. If you are a fan of eyepiece - well, that is an option though costly (the only negative point I have). This camera is easy to hold and does not intimidate people.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Nordenhold

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful photo results
customer_reviews.text: Used the camera for the 1st time and it takes great pictures and video on an all day photo trip. Purchased extra batteries to cover all day use. One problem is that I cannot find instructions how to manual focus as advertised in the description.
customer_reviews.author: AKS

customer_reviews.title: I've had this camera less than a year, 9 ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this camera less than a year, 9 months to be exact, and the zoom is stuck. I was going to return it for repair, but there is apparently no where to do that. Most things of this price have at least a year warranty. Apparently, not this.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for its performance.
customer_reviews.text: Received March 7, 2014 and took it on vacations. Found a hazy spot on close ups created by a blemish on lens protective coating. Afraid of receiving a refurbished if returned. Will find a local Sony authorized shop. A little cropping produce generic pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Great professional camera!!!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't do too well in low lighting but does AWESOME outdoors, the zoom is to die for!!! Great for bird watching or the zoo, professional quality pictures.
customer_reviews.author: alp5463

customer_reviews.title: ... that when I first got this camera I was disappointed with the slow shutter speed but despite that it ...
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that when I first got this camera I was disappointed with the slow shutter speed but despite that it takes very good, clear pictures even in low light and at maximum zoom. The anti shake technology really makes a difference and I was able to get some decent shots of the eclipse without the use of a tripod while my husband tried with his SLR this way and got just a blur. So I'm very happy with the photos this camera produces.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Prucha

customer_reviews.title: Good compact camera
customer_reviews.text: Had one before they take good pictures!!! And easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Lilly S.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is perfect for photography hobbyists like me. I take many snaps of family, friends and lots of landscape pictures. Pictures are vividly clear, even at great distances. I always carry it with me - it's easy to use and just the right size - fits in a small purse or bag. There are many features which I have not yet learned to use - there is a manual that summarizes the features; however, it takes time to experiment with them. I would highly recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera but charging system is not ideal - Box was opened
customer_reviews.text: Camera is great, but I received a camera box that was already opened. Not sure if this is one that is refurbished or not. I wish Sony included a separate wall charging unit for the battery. I don't like charging the battery in the camera because it creates potential trip and fall hazards when charging the camera with the cords dangling around. Also, the USB charger only provides 5 watts max so it seems that this would be a slow charge.
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: This camera takes wonderful pictures. We've played around with it quite a ...
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes wonderful pictures. We've played around with it quite a bit and have found it to be every bit worth the current cost (right around $315ish) -- with a 64gb SDXC card and a couple spare batteries we're going to explore New Orleans with it!
customer_reviews.author: Seth B.

customer_reviews.title: Just amazing. Great photos
customer_reviews.text: I took it on my trip to Turkey. Its fabulous. Just amazing. Great photos, great battery life, awesome. Better yet? Used it to video a stage show in a dark theater when I lost my video camera power cable. Result? Awesome! Just amazing low light video... Well done Sony.
customer_reviews.author: Edward C. L. Hommedieu

customer_reviews.title: Beware of undisclosed Japanese version from KEH Camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera that arrived from KEH was one with Japanese menu only, i.e., suspicious of a grey market item. Unfortunately, my old camera died and I needed a new one for a trip, so I did not return it and instead memorized the few menu settings I use most from a downloaded manual :-( Camera itself works great and is otherwise in fine condition.
customer_reviews.author: Petr Hlustik

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: I love the camera - 20 Mp & 30 Zoom - VERY compact yet easy to hold in hand. Very easy download to iPhoto (I am an Apple addict)
customer_reviews.author: Walter G Keating

customer_reviews.title: Great high zoom camera!
customer_reviews.text: The 30 x zoom is awesome and crisp. Even the digital 60x zoom is better than I expected! I love it and hope it isn't plagued with the grinding lens syndrome all my previous camera have had!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Sue

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD AND AT REASONABLE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: It just does right what it says it can do. For my needs as a tourist and / or family events recorder, it is working just fine. Images don't show pixels on a 42 inch screen. Maybe the only complain is that in my case the video button gets very easily on the way of my thumb, so I have made some involuntary video recordings.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Miguel Duenas Salgado

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely wonderful camera
customer_reviews.text: Takes great pictures, especially in low light - does fantastic in low light, and gets good definition, color and detail--and optical viewfinder is wonderful asset.
customer_reviews.author: fussy buyer

customer_reviews.title: Best digital camera ever
customer_reviews.text: Takes awesome picture of the moon with its texture and craters, the optical zoom is best and stable nice exposure control dial i use it for every shot i take in low light conditions , super handy feature.. .,.than choosing night mode which creates blur images if not handles properly....
customer_reviews.author: Pauras

customer_reviews.title: A Great digital camera that is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: A Great digital camera that is easy to use. It takes great pictures. The best thing I like about it is the ability to upload the pics directly to my android phone. It take much better pictures than my android and I can upload and share them with friends via my phone almost immediately. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: takes great pictures, arrived on time and was in perfect ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter to take pics in the mountains, takes great pictures, arrived on time and was in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Raines

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for an upscale point and shoot camera.
customer_reviews.text: For a point-and-shoot, this one offers a higher image quality than most, not to mention ability to "go manual." All in a fairly compact size.
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: top top
customer_reviews.text: The camera is amazing,user friendly, great zoom , the wifi works perfect to transfer your pics just in seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna

customer_reviews.title: Great optics
customer_reviews.text: A good camera with great optics. My "go to" camera. Do wish it had a viewfinder however
customer_reviews.author: Richard Ian Templeton

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and should really protect the camera.
customer_reviews.text: This case is great. It adds a little bit of weight but it is much sturdier than a soft shell case. It will certainly protect the camera screen because it is hard.
customer_reviews.author: sarckie

customer_reviews.title: Great all around pocket Camera fast shutter for action Photos
customer_reviews.text: Great all around pocket Camera fast shutter for action Photos. Makes a non professional take great pictures. I particularly love the panoramic feature. It is pricey though, but the pictures you get using this Camera makes you forget the cost. One thing I dislike is the placing of the Flash!
customer_reviews.author: Dean Gardner

customer_reviews.title: good camera
customer_reviews.text: good camera. easy to use. great definition. good price. i bought for my husbands rock show and took great pics and videos.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Melon

customer_reviews.title: Compact, Powerful options, Super zoom, High resolution
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera ... it is compact with so much power in its options and super zoom capability. The resolution is fantastic. I am completely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: cathyshopper

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Outdoor Photography
customer_reviews.text: Have been using to remotely photograph birds and wild animals using my iPhone as a controller. Immediate transfer by wifi to computer is an awesome feature.
customer_reviews.author: William H. Kichline Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Size and picture quality I was very impressed! I have an older Cybershot and loved it! This is right up there with it!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Schillereff

customer_reviews.title: Sony DSC- HX50V/B20.4MP Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Pictures are sharp. It's very good for a point & shoot camera. A lot better than the last Nikon I owned
customer_reviews.author: gen

customer_reviews.title: Very, very good
customer_reviews.text: Although this camera is heavy and thick its functionality is awesome. Its 30x optical zoom is really something. I've never seen anything similar before. Besides that it features several other facilities that can improve your photo experience. What i like: 30x optical zoom and picture's quality. What i don't like: while holding camera and pointing subject, your right thumb sometimes presses record button. Its position is not good. I do recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan L. Karpischin

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: excellent camera. Very pleased with the Sony camera- the zoom is outstanding--like the way you can program different settings, would recommend this camera to anyone. Small to fit in purse nice feel.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: This is the first Sony camera I've bought in several years, but I love it. I usually go with a Lumix for point and shoot, but this HX50 is a great combination of compact size and excellent picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: Keith DeMonbreun

customer_reviews.title: Like the camera Great 30x zoom but wish it had ...
customer_reviews.text: Like the camera Great 30x zoom but wish it had a flip up screen and camera RAW. Next model up has those things but much shorter zoom lens.
customer_reviews.author: Vic Zech

customer_reviews.title: I loved the hx9v I think it produced better video than ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved the hx9v I think it produced better video than this. This one has more zoom and maybe better photos
customer_reviews.author: Lou Walter Wilson

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: Takes excellent pictures. I like using the lighting adjustment knob. It allows you to take good quality pics with ease
customer_reviews.author: Craig Bovard

customer_reviews.title: Video is what sold me.
customer_reviews.text: The pictures shoot just as good as a 18mp camera, don't expect anything revolutionary! However! If you do get this camera, get it for the video if nothing else. It's super fluid and there has been little to no blur whatsoever. We took it up on our anniversary and every shot turned out beautiful, has a slight problem in dark shots. But unless you sacrifice some other features, I would be hard pressed to find a better camera. The next step up would be one of those 1k dslr camera.
customer_reviews.author: Skagerberg

customer_reviews.title: Sony DSC-HX50V/B  Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I've had the Fuji finepix F900erx, canonsx50, canon sx510, panasonic fz60 and now the sonyhx50v and of all of them the sony is my favorite!
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Much better than my old Sony
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Much better than my old Sony. Lots of features, I need to learn them all. The auto feature is fantastic. Have used this on many family vacations around the world and always get compliments on my pictures. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: brian k byon

customer_reviews.title: Great refurbished camera
customer_reviews.text: Great refurbished camera! Awesome zoom from such a small package! IT came with a free 50.00 leather case. It had a couple of small scratches But works perfectly The only disappointing thing is there was no protective cover for the external flash engagement point. See the attached photo of my first pic with this camera, I flipped the image so what you are seeing is upside down.
customer_reviews.author: Cason

customer_reviews.title: My iPhone 6 takes great pictures, but for zoming and high resolution
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. My iPhone 6 takes great pictures, but for zoming and high resolution, this camera is great. Product arrive in time, as expected. Had to buy memory chips.
customer_reviews.author: Lily Yang

customer_reviews.title: nice camera
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera, just the shooting pictures while recording video needs to reduce the resolution, so you end taking pictures is lower resolution.
customer_reviews.author: Zerg

customer_reviews.title: Great and durable camera -- made a great point and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great and durable camera -- made a great point and shoot driver for the vacations I've taken it on so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff B

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera, takes all of the smart guy photographer stuff out of taking amazing photos. It does it all for you, so many awesome features as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Love the zoom
customer_reviews.text: This is a versatile camera, small enough for travel, but powerful capabilities, including the 30x zoom. Pictures I have taken so far are very clear, even in low light.
customer_reviews.author: Lawre Pate

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I love the Sony cameras and have the earlier version of this one. It's a fantastic camera with a lot of fantastic features. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Wanderin

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful camera
customer_reviews.text: I needed a camera to keep with me at all times other than my cell phone. This camera takes excellent pictures and highly recommend. Zoom is the best feature.
customer_reviews.author: SW417

customer_reviews.title: Very nice camera.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice camera. I just wish it were a bit better in low light.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Abbott

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, but can't compare it to a professional camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera is great but after reading reviews that say the pictures are as good as a professional camera I found that they just don't match up.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the camera, the case is too hard to use, so is not helpful to me. Love the zoom.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: the camera seems alright but it won't accept any memory ...
customer_reviews.text: the camera seems alright but it won't accept any memory card so i can't use it but i'm a month too late to return it :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best compact camera that I have ever owned. Excellent zoom capability.
customer_reviews.author: In the Woods

customer_reviews.title: Best pocket Camera
customer_reviews.text: Best pocket Camera, I purchased the last two and waiting for the new version. The zoom and picture quality are phenomenal
customer_reviews.author: Joel V. Villanueva

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase, has great features and has sweep panorama, that i love. Has great HD movie and many intelligent automatic features to adjust your photo.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Hellbrugge Vizintin

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Good camera for a novice like me. Very vivid photos and much better than the iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: This compact takes fabulous shots
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, great shots and very easy to use on automatic settings. I need to work on my adjustable setting though! The battery life is very long and this camera is easy to carry with a neck strap!
customer_reviews.author: jane harris

customer_reviews.title: great pictures
customer_reviews.text: great all around wide angle camera. Easy to use! There is nothing here that I'm not thrilled with. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Techmaster

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: This is the third I have bought in this Sony series. By far the best. Quality at low light is great,
customer_reviews.author: lordexter

customer_reviews.title: Sony's Best Buy For A Small Camera.
customer_reviews.text: The Best Small Camera That Money Can Buy. A little Camera that will do any thing that you can do in photography.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Obenour

customer_reviews.title: Much improved over my last-gen HX20V
customer_reviews.text: It is a tad bigger (mostly thicker) but worth the extra bulk. The HX50 is very similar to the HX20 with the caveat of longer lens (30X optical vs. 20X), improved stabilization (in my mind), and noticeably better video (more stabile mainly). The awesome after-effects (illustration mode is so cool) are all there, the handheld twilight works well, and the panoramas are still intact. Some 3D still there. Its all good and a fun package to carry around. I don't use the GPS, nor the wifi local server function since the battery life is still the cybershot's weak spot. That being said, if you haven't had a recent Cybershot HX camera, the HX20V is still a classic!
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm GrangerTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Keeps surprising me with every picture I take
customer_reviews.text: I am more than happy with this camera, works perfectly, I find no cons about this product. Its just what my wife and I were looking for, takes great high quality pictures and movies and is easier to handle and take with you compared to the big pro cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Javier P.

customer_reviews.title: Camera
customer_reviews.text: Very nice camera with a lot of features. They have instructions posted online and you will need them to enjoy all of the features.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great camera when there is light, not so good indoor low light settings
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Sony DSC HX 5 V
customer_reviews.text: I like this camera a lot. It takes great pictures and movies. It works excellent in low light condition. The price is good.
customer_reviews.author: Tien Bui

product_meta.title: Sony DSC-HX50V/B 20.4MP Digital Camera with 3-Inch LCD Screen (Black)
product_meta.description:
Style:BaseCompact body with 30x optical and 60x Clear Image Zoom Take clear shots even in lowlight with high speed AF Multi Interface Shoe for expanding shooting options Zoom up close with 30x optical and 60x Clear Image Zoom Easy Camera Ctrl. & Image transfer via Wi-Fi with your Smartphone Features Full Manual Camera Controls, dedicated button for EV control

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 A+ DSC-HX50V 








Take hold of the textured grip and capture your next adventure with ultra-sharp precision. Not only does this compact, 20.4MP beauty deliver an impressive 30x optical zoom, action shots appear clearer thanks to advanced 3-way image stabilization. You also get full manual control for more creative shots and 1080/60p movie recording for smoother footage. You can even map your memories with built-in GPS tagging and accessorize with a wide variety of available extras. Technology Super 60x zoom Zoom in incredibly close for awesome sports, travel, and wildlife photos. The HX50V boasts 30x optical zoom plus 60x Clear Image Digital Zoom technology to bring you near enough to capture elated smiles on the sports field. A powerful processor reduces graininess for crisper, higher-quality close-ups. Say goodbye to blur Optical SteadyShot® image stabilization reduces shake and blur by countering camera movements in both horizontal and vertical directions3. Active 3-Way stabilization adds digital rolling control that counters clockwise and anti-clockwise rotation, resulting in more stable videos even at long focal lengths. Pixel Power With a 20.4-megapixel Exmor R® CMOS sensor, capture high-resolution images that take full advantage of the camera's high quality Carl Zeiss® lens. Advanced processing technology reduces noise and graininess for incredibly crisp, clear images - even in challenging low-light conditions. Amazing HD movies Record crystal-clear movies at the highest resolution available with Full HD 1080/60p video capture1. Stunning, fast motion video with reduced distortion looks great when played back on your HDTV2. Notice a perfect photo opp while shooting video? With dual record of stills and movies, you can shoot both at the same time. Control in the palm of your hand Take your photography to the next level with full manual control. Use Program Auto (P), Aperture Priority (A), Shutter Speed Priority (S) or Manual Exposure (M) mode for manual shooting and direct access exposure control via dedicated dial. Never miss the moment Capture full 20.4 megapixel resolution images at up to 10 frames per second, helping to ensure that the decisive moment is captured such as the soccer ball flying into the goal. In addition, a mechanical shutter helps reduce distortion when continuously shooting moving subjects. Additional features Explore the full range of features and options below. Multi interface shoe attaches flash, light, and mic
The multi interface shoe allows easy connection with wide-ranging accessories expanding the range of photographic expression. Available accessories include a powerful external flash unit, electronic viewfinder etc.



Incredible battery life of approx.
400 shots
Take up to 400 photos per charge for high-volume photography on-the-go. Perfect partner for travel.

3.0" LCD (921K dots) with high resolution viewing
The 3.0-inch Xtra Fine LCD™ LCD has 921K dots for superb resolution.



Intelligent Sweep Panorama™
mode-up to 360°
Intelligent Sweep Panorama mode takes our Sweep Panorama function to the next level with the addition of motion compensation. Even when subjects are moving in the foreground of your landscape, these cameras can detect faces and moving subjects, intelligently stitching different widths together to minimize distortion. Simply press the shutter button and sweep the camera in the desired direction and the camera continuously shoots at a high speed, then seamlessly stitches the images together with automatic position adjustment to create one stunning panoramic image. Available in wide and up to 360° full circle, the camera can take a variety of panoramic shots.



1. Records in 29 minute segments

2. Requires HDTV and HDMI cable sold separately

3. Combined with electronic stabilization

Sony, Cyber-shot, SteadyShot, Smile Shutter, Sweep Panorama, Exmor R and the Sony make.believe logo are trademarks of Sony. All other trademarks are trademarks of their respective owners. Features and specifications subject to change without notice.
feature_bullets: 30x optical zoom plus 60x Clear Image Digital Zoom Optical SteadyShot image stabilization with 3-way active mode 20.4MP images and high speed AF even in low-light
Full HD 1080/60p with dual record of stills and movies Full manual & dedicated EV control dial allow more creativity Capture the decisive moment with up to 10fps

Multi interface shoe attaches flash, light, and mic Incredible battery life of approx. 400 shots 3.0" LCD (921k dots) with high resolution viewing Take stunning images with Intelligent Sweep Panorama mode-up to 360 Degree
